title: move not remove files from the source that already exist in the destination
body:
When filing an issue, please include the following information if
possible as well as a description of the problem.  Make sure you are
using the [latest version of rclone](http://rclone.org/downloads/).

> What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`)
> rclone v1.33-13-g7be4c3a-fuse-flagsβ
> 
> Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
> Ubuntu 16.04
> Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
> Encrypted Amazon Cloud Drive
> The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
> rclone move /tv_shows/ eacd:media/tv_shows -v
> 
> A log from the command with the `-v` flag (eg output from `rclone -v copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

2016/09/29 16:45:11 Encrypted amazon drive root '40vr5l7bbib53ql2gesinnck6c/lnhbggu7s6ai3oora37epq5qmk': Waiting for checks to finish
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/folder.jpg: Sizes identical
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/folder.jpg: Unchanged skipping
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/logo.png: Sizes identical
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/landscape.jpg: Sizes identical
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/landscape.jpg: Unchanged skipping
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/fanart.jpg: Sizes identical
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/tvshow.nfo: Sizes identical
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/tvshow.nfo: Unchanged skipping
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/fanart.jpg: Unchanged skipping
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/logo.png: Unchanged skipping
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/S8/folder.jpg: Sizes identical
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/S8/folder.jpg: Unchanged skipping
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/clearart.png: Sizes identical
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/clearart.png: Unchanged skipping
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/S8/poster.jpg: Sizes identical
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/S8/poster.jpg: Unchanged skipping
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/poster.jpg: Sizes identical
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Ink Master/poster.jpg: Unchanged skipping
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Encrypted amazon drive root '40vr5l7bbib53ql2gesinnck6c/lnhbggu7s6ai3oora37epq5qmk': Waiting for transfers to finish
2016/09/29 16:45:11
Transferred:      0 Bytes (0 Bytes/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 9
Transferred:            0
Elapsed time:        7.8s
2016/09/29 16:45:11 Go routines at exit 33

It had issues with uploading some of these initially but they seem to have uploaded but it will not remove them from the local directory on a second run. I noticed this on other files as well, if I did a 'move' it would find the ones in ACD and then say the size was identical and do the unchanged skipping but then leave them in the local directory.

I expected that it would remove the local copies since I did the 'move' option. Is that not the case?

└── tv_shows
    └── Ink Master
        ├── clearart.png
        ├── fanart.jpg
        ├── folder.jpg
        ├── landscape.jpg
        ├── logo.png
        ├── poster.jpg
        ├── S8
        │   ├── folder.jpg
        │   └── poster.jpg
        └── tvshow.nfo

Thank you!

Edit: adding -I to the command uploaded the files again and deleted the local copies.
